pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert IP Addresses to Country Names or Full Location with Geoplotting // Tools for identifying the origins of IP addresses. Includes functions for converting IP addresses to country names, location details (region, city, zip, latitude, longitude), IP codes, binary values, as well as a function for plotting IP locations on a world map. This product includes IP2Location LITE data available from http://www.ip2location.com and is is available by Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 Interational license (CC-BY-SA 4.0).
